Title: HEX® Protective Gear
Body HTML:
HEX® Padded Protective Gear


Improve your game with HEX® gear, the ultimate choice for high-performing athletes. Your athletic wear is a critical factor in determining your success, which is why we offer state-of-the-art protective gear to help you achieve your goals.


Our HEX® gear is specifically designed to support your body, muscles, and movements, allowing you to perform at your best. Whether you need HEX® pads, padded leg and arm sleeves, or padded shirts, shorts, tights, and supports, we have everything you need to enhance your game.


Investing in HEX® gear is investing in your success. Don't settle for anything less than the best - choose HEX® and take your performance to the next level.

Protective Gear & Accessories


McDavid's Protective Collection is designed to provide the best support and confidence to athletes. With over 35+ years of experience, we design gear that works on every level, taking into account the specific ergonomic and structural nature of each body part and potential condition.

Title: Compression Wear & Recovery Gear

Compression Athletic Gear


McDavid compression wear and recovery gear are designed to help athletes train harder, recover faster, and perform better. Our gear utilizes targeted compression to improve circulation and support muscles, while also promoting recovery after exercise.


We offer a range of compression wear and recovery gear, including compression sleeves, socks, tights, and more. Whether you're looking to improve your performance on the field or in the gym, McDavid has the gear you need to take your training to the next level.

Title: Injury Prevention & Recovery Gear
Body HTML:
Injury Recovery and Prevention Gear


As an athlete, injuries are an inevitable part of the game. But that doesn't mean you have to stay sidelined for long. At McDavid, we're dedicated to helping you get back on the field or court as quickly as possible. Our range of high-quality sports protection and performance apparel is designed to support and enhance your athletic abilities.


Discover our innovative line of premium sports gear, designed to help you perform at your best while also minimizing the risk of injury. Whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting out, our products are designed to meet the needs of athletes of all levels.


And the best part? You can shop now and enjoy free shipping on qualifying orders. So what are you waiting for? Get back in the game with McDavid today!

Title: Hinged Knee Braces
Body HTML:
Experience Unrivaled Stability with McDavid Hinged Knee Braces


Unlock the pinnacle of protection and support with McDavid Hinged Knee Braces. Specially crafted for individuals requiring advanced post-surgery care or heightened support during athletic endeavors, these braces redefine the standard of knee reinforcement. Engineered to maintain optimal alignment and promote healing while minimizing the risk of further injury, McDavid Hinged Knee Braces offer unparalleled stability and peace of mind.

Advanced Support for Enhanced Recovery:

  • McDavid Hinged Knee Braces are meticulously designed to provide a superior level of protection and support, making them a preferred choice for patients and athletes seeking comprehensive knee care.
  • Experience the transformative power of advanced stabilization as these braces keeps your knee in proper alignment during movement, facilitating the healing process and reducing the likelihood of reinjury.
  • Available in Level 3 Maximum and Maximum Plus protection and support.
  • Ideal for moderate to major instabilities, proactive injury prevention, and post-surgical joint protection.

Unmatched Performance, Superior Comfort:

  • Don't compromise on comfort while prioritizing support. McDavid Hinged Knee Braces combine cutting-edge technology with premium materials to offer a comfortable fit without sacrificing performance.
  • Whether you're recovering from surgery or pushing your limits on the field, these braces adapt seamlessly to your lifestyle, providing unrivaled stability and confidence with every step.

Elevate Your Recovery Journey:

  • Empower your recovery journey with McDavid Hinged Knee Braces. Designed to optimize healing and prevent setbacks, these braces serve as a reliable companion on your path to recovery.
  • Invest in your well-being and embrace the reassurance of superior protection and support. Choose McDavid Hinged Knee Braces and experience the difference today.

Don't settle for anything less than excellence when it comes to knee care. Embrace the unparalleled support and stability of McDavid Hinged Knee Braces. Transform your recovery journey and reclaim your confidence in motion.

Title: Closed and Open Patella Knee Braces & Sleeves
Body HTML:
Optimize Knee Support with McDavid Closed and Open Patella Knee Sleeves & Braces


Experience tailored support and relief with McDavid Closed and Open Patella Knee Braces. Engineered to cater to diverse needs, our collection offers specialized solutions designed to enhance comfort, stability, and performance. Whether you prefer the targeted relief of an Open Patella design or the uniform compression of a Closed Patella brace, McDavid has you covered.

Customized Support for Every Movement:

  • McDavid Knee Braces with an Open Patella alleviate knee pressure while providing enhanced support to the kneecap during movement. Experience optimal tracking and freedom of motion with our innovative design, tailored to deliver relief precisely where you need it.
  • Opt for McDavid Closed Patella Knee Braces to experience uniform compression across the knee, ensuring consistent support throughout your activities. Say goodbye to discomfort and embrace stability with every step.
  • Available in Level 1, Level 2, Level 3 Maximum and Maximum Plus Protection and Support.
  • Ideal for moderate to major instabilities, proactive injury prevention, and post-surgical joint protection.

Tailored Comfort, Unmatched Performance:

  • Discover the perfect balance of comfort and functionality with McDavid Knee Braces. Crafted from premium materials and advanced technology, our braces offer superior comfort without compromising on performance.
  • Whether you're engaging in rigorous workouts or navigating daily activities, McDavid Knee Braces adapt seamlessly to your lifestyle, providing the support you need to thrive.

Elevate Your Knee Care Routine:

  • Take control of your knee health with McDavid Closed and Open Patella Knee Braces. Experience the difference in support, comfort, and performance, tailored to meet your unique needs.
  • Invest in quality care and unlock the power of targeted relief and stability. Choose McDavid Knee Braces and redefine your journey to optimal knee health.

Don't let knee discomfort hold you back. Embrace the tailored support of McDavid Closed and Open Patella Knee Braces. Experience relief, stability, and confidence with every step.

Title: Knee Braces and Supports
Body HTML:
Protective Knee Braces and Supports


Protect your knees and avoid becoming another injury statistic. Our ergonomic and comfortable knee sleeves and braces provide superior pain relief, stability, and support for minor to major instabilities and conditions. Our products aim to help relieve pain and improve knee stability, allowing you to continue training and competing at your best. Don't let knee injuries hold you back - try our line of support products today!
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Knee Braces - Maximum Support, Protection & Recovery | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Browse our wide selection of knee braces, support and recovery products, only at McDavidUSA. Order our knee support gear to prevent injury and help reduce downtime!

Title: Ankle Braces and Supports
Body HTML:
Ankle Braces and Ankle Supports for Recovery


Protect your ankles from sprains and strains with McDavid’s ankle braces and sleeves. Our products are designed to promote quick, agile motion without hindrance. Our ankle braces provide comfort and targeted support, while promoting healing through compression. We offer three levels of support: Level 1 sleeves provide relief from minor injuries and inflammation; Level 2 supports stabilize ligaments and provide moderate support and pain relief, and Level 3 braces offer maximum support through anatomical design and first-class compression. Trust McDavid to provide high-quality support when you need it most.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Ankle Braces - Support and Protection for Enhanced Performance | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Find the best ankle support and braces at McDavidUSA. Our ergonomic protection straps, sleeves, wraps, and supports provide maximum efficiency to enhance your performance and prevent injuries. Shop now!

Title: Back/Waist Braces and Supports
Body HTML:
Back & Waist Braces/Supports


Your spine is critical to your overall health and wellness, as it supports your body's core and enables physical motion. Protecting your back and waist is vital in any sport, especially those with significant contact. Our back supports and waist trimmers provide athletes with the support, compression, and pain relief they need to perform their best. We offer three levels of protection, depending on your needs. Don't let pain hold you back from achieving your goals; wear the gear that helps you stay in the game.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Back and Waist Support Products | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Find the perfect waist and back support gear at McDavidUSA. Our stabilizers, pads, and more are designed to help prevent injury and can reduce downtime. Shop our wide selection of high-quality products now and give your body the support it needs to stay in top form!

Title: Shoulder Braces and Supports
Body HTML:
Shoulder Braces and Supports


Maintaining a full range of motion is crucial for joint health and an active lifestyle. However, injuries like sprains, strains, and tendonitis can compromise joint health and prevent you from training and competing. That's why we created our shoulder wraps and supports with rest, compression, thermal activity, and limited mobility in mind. Our simple yet effective designs offer various levels of support and structure, and our adjustable straps ensure a comfortable fit for relief and recovery. Give your joints the break they need to relieve pain and continue to perform at your best.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Shoulder Support & Protection Gear - Top Quality | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Don't let a shoulder injury slow you down. Shop the best selection of shoulder support and protection gear at McDavidUSA. Our top-quality wraps, braces, and recovery shirts offer superior protection at affordable prices. Browse our wide selection and get back in the game today!

Title: Elbow Braces, Supports, and Bands
Body HTML:
Elbow Braces, Arm Sleeves, and Bands


Joint pain can limit an athlete's potential. Whether you're a running back, basketball player, or engaged in any other sport, elbow pain can impede your performance. Our compression sleeves and wraps provide protection and support for your elbow, enhancing your athletic ability. Our elbow sleeves offer different degrees of protection, with Shooter Arm Sleeves featuring 9mm HEX® padding for muscle protection and hDc® moisture management technology to keep your skin cool. Don't limit your range of motion - take action and protect your joints with our durable, effective gear.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Elbow & Arm Support Gear - Sleeves, Pads & More | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Protect your elbows and arms during sports activities with McDavidUSA's arm and elbow support gear. Browse our wide selection of sleeves, pads, and other protective equipment for baseball, basketball, football, MMA, and more. Get the best deals at McDavidUSA!

Title: Wrist Braces and Thumb Supports
Body HTML:
Wrist Braces and Thumb Support


Injured or inflamed wrists can limit daily activities, especially for athletes. Our wrist braces provide compression to muscles and limit joint mobility, allowing for internal components to heal. Designed for three levels of relief, our wrist braces offer adjustable wear and compression. Level 1 wraps provide basic support and promote healing. Level 2 guards provide relief, support, and healing, while Level 3 helps reduce the risk of hyperextension with superior wrist support and compression. Get back in the game with our wrist braces!
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Wrist Braces, Supports, Protection & Recovery | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Looking for high-quality wrist support and brace gear? Look no further than McDavidUSA. Our selection includes wristbands, sleeves, and more to help you recover from wrist injuries and prevent new ones. Browse our selection and order today at the best prices!

Title: Calf & Shin Compression Sleeves
Body HTML:
Calf & Shin Recovery Sleeves


Protect your legs and keep them performing at their best with our industry-leading leg sleeves. Running and endurance exercise can be tough on your calves and shins, leading to inflammation, strains, and sprains. Our leg sleeves offer compression fabric that is breathable, flexible, and durable, featuring hDc™ moisture management tech. Whether you choose our HEX® sleeves with 9mm padding for contact sports, or our Targeted Compression® sleeves, our product is designed to support and improve circulation, enhance recovery, and keep you comfortable and cool. Don't let leg pain slow you down - choose our ergonomic, lightweight design for higher performance.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Shin & Calf Support Gear | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Protect your shins and calves during sports activities with McDavidUSA's durable and effective gear. Shop our selection of shin and calf support products for the ultimate protection and performance enhancement. Order now!

Title: Find the Right Level of Protection & Support with McDavid
Body HTML:
Protection Levels – Find The Right Level of Support


Looking for the right level of protection and support for your needs? McDavid offers three levels to choose from. Level 1 provides general purpose protection and support for minor pain, sprains, and instabilities. Level 2 is designed for minor to moderate ligament instabilities and pain. For moderate to major instabilities and pain, choose Level 3 for ultimate protection and support. Our braces and supports feature adjustable straps, stays, and hinges for additional support and comfort, along with neoprene technology for therapeutic heat retention and soft-tissue support. Choose McDavid for reliable, high-quality protection and support.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Find the Right Level of Protection & Support with McDavid | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Find the right level of protection and support for your needs with McDavid's three-level system. Level 1 provides general-purpose support for minor pain and instabilities, while Level 2 is designed for minor to moderate ligament issues. For moderate to major instabilities, choose Level 3 with adjustable straps and neoprene technology for ultimate protection.

Title: Level 1 Primary Protection - General-Purpose Support
Body HTML:
Level 1 Primary Support and Protection  - Best For Minor Pain and Sprains


Introducing our Level 1 Primary Collection! Our collection features sleeves and supports designed to deliver general-purpose protection and support to athletes dealing with minor pain, sprains, instabilities, arthritis, bursitis and tendonitis. Our primary collection includes adjustable straps for a custom fit and promotes healing through the use of neoprene thermal therapy and breathable elastic. Protect your joints and muscles while you train and compete with our Level 1 Primary Collection.


We offer protective gear that supports your ligaments, muscles, and your next game-altering thought, bolstering every athlete's attitude and confidence. Trust McDavid to provide you with top-quality protective gear that ensures you perform at your best.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Level 1 Primary Collection - General Support & Protection | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Looking for general-purpose protection and support? Check out McDavid's Level 1 Primary Collection! With adjustable straps and neoprene technology, our collection promotes healing for minor pain, sprains, instabilities, arthritis, bursitis and tendonitis. Train with confidence - choose McDavid!

Title: Level 2 Advanced Protection - Minor and Moderate Support
Body HTML:
Level 2 Advanced Protection and Support - Best For Minor To Moderate Ligament Instabilities


Take your performance to the next level with our Level 2 Advanced Collection. Our wraps and supports are designed to deliver minor to moderate protection and support for minor to moderate ligament instabilities or pain. Our collection features adjustable straps, stays, and buttresses for additional protection and support through compression. The neoprene material promotes healing through therapeutic heat retention and soft-tissue support. Don't let minor injuries hold you back, choose McDavid for the added support you need to reach your full potential.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Level 2 Advanced Collection - Supports & Wraps for Performance | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Get minor to moderate protection with McDavid's Level 2 Advanced Collection. Featuring wraps and supports designed for ligament instabilities or pain, adjustable straps, stays, and buttresses. The neoprene material promotes healing through therapeutic heat retention and compression. Shop now!

Title: Level 3 Maximum Protection - Ultimate Support and Recovery
Body HTML:
Level 3 Maximum Protection and Support - Best For Moderate to Major Instabilities and Proactive Injury Prevention


Introducing the McDavid Level 3 Maximum Collection - the ultimate in protection and support. Designed for moderate to major instabilities and pain, our braces and guards feature hinges, splints, straps, and stays for unparalleled support. With neoprene promoting healing through therapeutic heat retention and soft-tissue support through compression, this collection offers the ultimate protection. Don't let injuries hold you back - trust in McDavid's Maximum Collection for maximum support and recovery.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Level 3 Maximum Collection - Ultimate Support & Protection | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Experience unparalleled protection with McDavid's Level 3 Maximum Collection - designed for moderate to major instabilities and pain. Our braces and guards feature hinges, splints, straps, and stays for the ultimate support, while neoprene promotes healing through therapeutic heat retention and soft-tissue compression. Get the support you need to recover with McDavid's Maximum Collection.

Title: Level 3 Maximum Plus Protection - Joint Support and Therapeutic Recovery
Body HTML:
Level 3 Maximum Plus Support - Best For Major Join Instabilities and Post-Surgical Joint Protection


McDavid's Level 3 Maximum Plus Collection is perfect for major joint instabilities, post-surgical joint protection, and therapeutic recovery. Our braces and guards provide the ultimate protection and support for moderate to major instabilities and pain. With features like hinges, splints, straps, and stays, these products offer the support you need for complete joint protection. Plus, our neoprene material promotes healing through therapeutic heat retention and soft-tissue support through compression. Trust McDavid for the best in joint protection and recovery.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Level 3 Maximum Plus Collection - Joint Protection & Recovery | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Discover McDavid's Level 3 Maximum Plus Collection for complete joint protection and ultimate support. Perfect for post-surgical joint protection and therapeutic recovery, our braces and guards feature hinges, splints, straps, and stays. Trust McDavid for the best in joint protection and recovery.

Title: Innovative Cold Therapy Products for Pain and Swelling
Body HTML:
Cold Therapy - Best for Post-Workout Recovery


Looking for an innovative way to apply ice? Check out our cold therapy products! Our sleeves and wraps are designed with a precise anatomical fit for outstanding comfort, and compression for further healing. Whether you're recovering from a tough workout or nursing an injury, our cold therapy products provide effective treatment for pain and swelling. Use them as part of your daily recovery and rehab program, and experience 360 degrees of compression therapy with 100% coverage of the treatment area. Try our cold therapy products today and feel the difference!

Title: Basketball Performance and Protective Gear
Body HTML:
Basketball Gear & Equipment


Basketball is an intense sport that demands a lot from your body, especially your knees, ankles, and shoulders. McDavid understands the rigorous demands of the game, which is why we have crafted all of our products to best suit basketball players.


Our products provide protection and support for joints that are often injured while in motion. We offer a range of knee pads, ankle braces, and shoulder wraps to help prevent injuries and keep you playing at your best. Our Elite HEX® Shooter Sleeves and HEX® Force knee pads also offer protective compression, which can improve circulation and prevent abrasions and bruising.

We know how important it is to stay in the game, which is why we’ve created these products to help you play at your best, with the protection and support you need to take your game to the next level.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Shop Basketball Protective Gear - Sleeves, Pads & Braces | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Shop like a pro with McDavid's basketball gear. Find protective braces, sleeves, shorts, wraps, and support products designed for the court. Get the gear the pros wear and stay ready for any on-court battle.

Title: Lacrosse Protective Performance Gear
Body HTML:
Lacrosse Protective Gear & Equipment


Playing lacrosse can be intense and aggressive, requiring physical toughness and endurance. It's a sport that demands precise hand-eye coordination and the ability to take big hits. At McDavid, we understand the challenges of lacrosse and offer a range of protective and supportive gear designed to help athletes perform at their best.


Our Rival™ and HEX® padded shirts and girdles feature precision padding where it's needed most. These padded tops and bottoms help to absorb the force of collisions and protect you in case of a hit, so you can play with confidence. Plus, the compression-based, moisture-wicking fabric keeps you cool and dry during the most intense moments.


We also offer a variety of support products to help with injuries. Whether you need compression, pain relief, or ligament stability, we have the gear you need to recover and get back in the game. At McDavid, we're committed to providing lacrosse players with the best gear possible, so they can focus on making big plays and winning games.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Shop Protective Lacrosse Gear & Apparel | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Shop your lacrosse gear from McDavidUSA and attack your game like the baller you are! From shin pads to knee sleeves, we have the protection products you need!

Title: Soccer Gear - Braces, Guards & Sleeves
Body HTML:
Soccer Gear & Equipment


Soccer demands endurance and strength from its players, making it crucial for athletes to keep their leg muscles and ligaments healthy. When running up the field or defending, players need their ankles, calves, knees, thighs, and groin to perform at their best. Any disturbance in these areas can slow a player down or limit their lateral movements. At McDavid, we understand the demands of soccer and have designed our gear to keep players healthy and competitive.


Our VOW™ (Versatile Over Wrap) knee braces provide targeted support against patella tracking issues and other knee alignment injuries, so you can keep playing without pain or discomfort. Our three-level ankle braces offer various stages of compression, support, and stability, ensuring you can perform at your best on the field. Our compression shorts contain superior compression, keeping muscles warm and stabilized while wicking away moisture to keep you cool during intense training or competition. With McDavid soccer gear, you can play confidently and comfortably, no matter what challenges you face on the field.

Metafield: description_tag [string]: Safeguard your soccer performance with McDavid's targeted support gear. Get knee & ankle braces, shin guards & compression wear to stay safe from impact & injury. Trust McDavid for high-quality protection on the field.

Title: Training & Fitness Workout Gear
Body HTML:
Training & Fitness Workout Equipment and Gear


Success in fitness is all about consistency and hard work. But joint pain and swelling can often hold us back and prevent us from reaching our goals. At McDavid, we understand the struggle and we're committed to helping our customers achieve their fitness objectives. Our products are designed to keep you in the gym, making progress towards your goals without the risk of injury.


Our gear is engineered to provide support and stability, so you can train harder and smarter without the fear of nagging injuries. We know that fitness is a journey, and we're here to support you every step of the way. Whether you're a seasoned athlete or just starting your fitness journey, we have the products to help you reach your full potential.


Don't let joint pain hold you back. Check out our hand-picked selection of fitness gear and train with confidence, knowing that you have the support you need to make those gains and achieve your fitness goals.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Shop Training & Fitness Gear for Peak Performance | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Train harder and smarter with McDavidUSA fitness gear. Our products provide support and stability, helping you avoid nagging injuries and achieve your fitness goals. Whether you're a seasoned athlete or just starting your journey, we have the gear to help you succeed.

Title: Football Protective Gear
Body HTML:
Football Equipment & Gear


The gridiron is where champions are made, and every play is an opportunity to shine. As a football player, you know the pain and toll that the game can take on your body. That's why McDavid offers the best protective gear on the market to help you focus on achieving your best without worrying about aches and pains.


Whether you're looking to decrease soreness and speed up your recovery or protect yourself with an athletic support cup, we have everything you need to stay on top of your game. Our compression gear helps decrease rest periods and improve circulation, while our athletic tape provides support for those nagging aches and pains. We know that when you combine the right products with your talent and ambition, nothing can stop you. Are you ready to dominate on the gridiron? McDavid is here to help you get there.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Shop Football Gear - Girdles, Tights, Pads & Sleeves | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Order quality football gear, girdles, tights, pads, and sleeves to prevent injuries and enhance your performance. Get your braces and protection products today at McDavidUSA!

Title: MMA/Boxing Protective Gear
Body HTML:
MMA/Boxing Gear and Training Equipment


Whether you're stepping into the ring for MMA or Boxing, you know it's not just about throwing punches or taking your opponent to the ground. It's about the years of hard work and dedication you've put in, the countless hours spent training your mind and body to be at its best. At McDavid, we understand that MMA/Boxing is a sport that demands the highest level of physical and mental fitness, and that's why we've created the best protective gear to keep you performing at your peak.


Our gear is designed to help you get the most out of your training while reducing the risk of injury. With McDavid gear, you can focus on your technique and strategy without worrying about the wear and tear on your body. Our VOW™ (Versatile Over Wrap) knee braces provide targeted support against patella tracking issues and other knee alignment injuries, while our HEX® padded shirts and shorts offer precision padding where you need it most.


Boxers and MMA fighters trust us because we've been protecting them for years. Our products are designed to withstand the toughest of challenges and give you the confidence to go all-out. Whether you're training in the gym or competing in the ring, we've got your back. Choose McDavid and train with the best gear on the planet.

Title: Tennis Protective Performance Gear
Body HTML:
Tennis Gear & Equipment


Tennis is a fiercely competitive and physically demanding sport that requires hours of training and conditioning to master. At McDavid, we understand the rigors of intense tennis training and the toll it can take on your body. Common conditions like tennis elbow and shoulder and knee tendonitis can be frustrating and painful, but with the right gear, you can reduce your risk of injury and stay on top of your game.


Our selection of gear for tennis players is designed to help eliminate those aches and pains that can sideline you. From compression gear to braces and supports, we offer products that provide targeted relief to the areas most prone to injury. Whether you need extra support for your knees, ankles, or elbows, our gear can help you stay in the game and compete at your best.


Don't let wear and tear prevent you from following your passion. With McDavid gear, you can train harder and longer, reduce your risk of injury, and get back on the court with confidence. So why wait? Shop our selection of tennis gear today and take your game to the next level!

Title: Sports Protective and Recovery Accessories
Body HTML:
Sports Tape and Accessories


Get the most out of your workouts with McDavid's sports accessories. Our underwrap helps prevent skin irritation and makes taping easier, while our Kinesiology Tape offers extra support and aids in injury prevention. Our athletic tape is perfect for wrapping joints and securing pads, and our wrist wraps provide comfortable, adjustable support for the wrist. Whether you're a professional athlete or just starting out, McDavid's sports accessories will keep you in the game. Shop now and take your performance to the next level.

Metafield: description_tag [string]: Maximize your workouts with McDavid's sports accessories. Our underwrap and Kinesiology Tape help prevent skin irritation, provide extra support, and aid in injury prevention. Our athletic tape and wrist wraps offer comfortable, adjustable support for your joints and pads. Whether you're a pro or just starting out, McDavid's sports accessories will keep you in the game.

Title: Baseball and Softball Protective Performance Gear
Body HTML:
Baseball Equipment & Gear


As a softball or baseball player, you know that training harder and wanting it more is what separates the victors from the rest. But injuries like shoulder and knee issues, sprains, and tears can stop you from achieving your goals. That's where McDavid comes in - we provide top-quality gear to help you perform at your best while minimizing the risk of injury.


Our products are designed to provide pain relief and increase blood flow to affected areas, helping speed up your recovery and get you back to doing what you love. From shoulder and knee braces to compression gear, we have everything you need to stay healthy and play your best. And don't forget about our athletic cups for added protection!

In harsh conditions, stay cool with our signature uCool series. Whatever your needs, we've got you covered with the gear you need to up your game and stay healthy. At McDavid, we're committed to helping you achieve your best, so you can come out on top every time.

Title: Baseball and Softball Protective Performance Gear
Running Performance Gear
Body HTML:
Running Gear and Equipment


Running is a fantastic way to stay fit and clear your mind. At McDavid, we engineer all of our products with runners' best interests in mind. We know that the aches and pains of running can add up and become a major obstacle. Knee and ankle issues, like runner's knee, can put you out of commission for weeks or even months.


That's why we put runners' needs first. Our lightweight and comfortable gear offers different levels of support to give you the perfect amount of compression and stability to keep you moving. Don't let injuries and pain stop you from pursuing your passion for running. With McDavid, you can focus on achieving your running goals without worrying about setbacks. Whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting out, McDavid has the gear you need to keep going for the long run.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Shop Running Sports Gear for Performance & Protection | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Looking for gear that helps prevent knee and ankle injuries while running? McDavid offers products with different levels of support to keep you moving. Whether you're a pro or just starting out, our lightweight and comfortable gear can help you focus on achieving your running goals without worrying about setbacks. Shop now.

Title: Volleyball Protective Performance Gear
Body HTML:
Volleyball Gear & Equipment


Are you looking to take your volleyball game to the next level? As a fast-paced, physically demanding sport, volleyball requires you to be in top shape and free from pain and injuries. At McDavid, we understand the challenges volleyball players face and have designed our products to help you perform your best.


Our knee supports are a great way to protect your joints from the constant jumping involved in volleyball. We offer a wide variety of knee supports to suit your specific needs and preferences. In addition to this, our compression gear helps to fight muscular soreness and fatigue, enabling you to perform at your best for longer.


When the games start heating up, you can count on our signature uCool series to help you stay cool and comfortable. Whether you need to protect your joints or enhance your recovery, we have everything you need to stay on top of your game.


At McDavid, we believe in providing volleyball players with the best gear available to help them achieve their goals. Don't let pain or injury hold you back from performing your best – choose McDavid and take your volleyball game to the next level!
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Shop Volleyball Protective Gear - Pads, Braces, Sleeves & More | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Looking to up your volleyball game? McDavid offers knee supports and compression gear to keep you performing at your best. Protect your joints from jumping and fight muscular soreness and fatigue with our targeted gear.

Title: Protective Padded Sleeves
Body HTML:
Padded Compression Sleeves


Looking for added protection during high-contact activities? Look no further than McDavid's Protective Padded Sleeves. Our industry-leading HEX® technology provides 9mm lightweight padding to protect areas of the body prone to impact. Whether you're playing basketball or football, these sleeves are designed to protect and perform. With a breathable and flexible design, our sleeves offer compression and durability while ensuring a comfortable fit. Don't let minor injuries or falls slow you down, get the protection you need and stay in the game with McDavid's Protective Padded Sleeves.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Protective Padded Sleeves - Perform at Your Best | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Get the ultimate protection with McDavid's Protective Padded Sleeves! Our HEX® technology provides lightweight padding for high-impact areas, offering top-notch protection during high-contact activities like basketball and football. These breathable and flexible sleeves offer compression and durability for a comfortable fit, allowing you to perform at your best with confidence.

Title: Protective Cups & Supporters
Body HTML:
Athletic Jockstraps, Briefs and Cups


Get maximum protection and comfort with McDavid's Cups and Supporters collection. Our durable and reliable products are designed to keep you safe and comfortable during any athletic activity. With superior support and protection, you can trust McDavid to help you stay focused on your performance. Don't settle for anything less than the best when it comes to protecting your sensitive areas. Shop McDavid now for a secure and worry-free experience.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Cups and Supporters - Ultimate Protection and Comfort | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Looking for reliable protection and comfort for sensitive areas? Look no further than McDavid's Cups and Supporters collection. Our durable products are designed to keep you safe and comfortable during any athletic activity. Trust McDavid to provide superior support and protection, so you can focus on your performance. Shop now for a secure and worry-free experience.

Title: Protective Padded Shirts and Tanks
Body HTML:
Padded Compression Shirts and Tanks


Introducing McDavid's Protective Padded Tops! Our HEX® technology padded shirts and tanks provide ultimate protection to your chest, ribs and spine. Whether you're on the field, court or in the gym, our padded tops offer lightweight, comfortable and durable protection to help you stay at your best. Our superior moisture management technology keeps you cool and dry, while the anatomical design offers maximum range of motion. Trust McDavid to stay safe and get more.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Protective Padded Tops - Durable and Lightweight | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Check out McDavid's Protective Padded Tops! Our HEX® technology padded shirts and tanks offer lightweight, comfortable and durable protection to your chest, ribs and spine. Keep cool and dry with our moisture management technology while our anatomical design offers maximum range of motion. Trust McDavid for reliable, high-quality protection during your athletic pursuits.

Title: Protective Sports Tape and Accessories
Body HTML:
Protective Athletic Tape and Pre-Wrap


Protect yourself from injury with McDavid's Protective Accessories. Our underwrap, kinesiology tape, athletic tape, and wrist wraps provide the support and compression you need to stay in the game. Our products are made with lightweight, moisture-wicking materials that keep you comfortable and protected. Whether you need to wrap an injured joint or provide additional support during play, McDavid has you covered. Trust in our quality and protect yourself with McDavid Protective Accessories.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Protective Accessories: Support and Compression to Stay in the Game | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Looking for reliable and comfortable protective accessories? Look no further than McDavid. Our underwrap, kinesiology tape, athletic tape, and wrist wraps provide support and compression to keep you in the game. Made with lightweight and moisture-wicking materials, our products offer maximum comfort and protection. Shop now and trust in McDavid for your protective accessory needs.

Title: Protective Padded Shorts and Tights
Body HTML:
Protective Compression Shorts and Tights


Get the ultimate protection and support with McDavid's protective padded bottoms. Our tights and shorts are designed with our HEX® padding to provide 9mm of reliable and durable padding in high-contact areas. Perfect for a range of sports, including basketball, football, and rugby. Our breathable and moisture-wicking fabrics keep you cool and comfortable while providing compression for enhanced performance. Don't let your gear hold you back, trust McDavid to give you the confidence to take your game to the next level.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Protective Padded Bottoms: Ultimate in Sports Protection | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: McDavid's padded tights and shorts provide the ultimate protection and support for high-contact activities like basketball, football, and rugby. With HEX® padding and moisture-wicking fabric, our gear delivers compression and durability for enhanced performance. Take your game to the next level with McDavid.

Title: Knee Braces & Supports For Common Knee Injuries
Body HTML:
Braces For Knee Injuries and Knee Pain


Athlete's knees often bear the brunt of the body's weight and are prone to injury from repetitive stress, impact, or sudden movement. The knee is a complex joint, making it crucial to provide adequate support for proper healing, allowing every ligament and tendon to work in harmony for a lifetime of activity.


At McDavid, we understand that true athletes want to get back to their sport or workout routine as soon as possible after a knee injury. That's why we offer a range of wraps, sleeves, buttresses, and braces designed to support your knees as they heal. Whether you have a mild or severe knee injury, we have the right product to help you follow your trainer's orders and recover quickly. Get back to your prime condition with McDavid's support.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Knee Injury Braces & Supports | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Protect and heal your knees with McDavid's range of wraps, sleeves, and braces designed to offer optimal support during the healing process. Choose from a variety of products to get back to your prime condition quickly.

Title: Knee Braces for ACL Tears and Injuries
Metafield: title_tag [string]: ACL Injury Protection & Support | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: An ACL injury can be debilitating, but with the right treatment plan, it's possible to recover and return to your previous level of activity. Choose from McDavid's range of products including braces and supports to help stabilize your knee and facilitate healing.

Title: Knee Braces for MCL Tears and Injuries
Ankle Braces & Supports For Common Ankle Injuries
Body HTML:
Braces for Ankle Injuries and Ankle Sprains


At McDavid, we understand that as an athlete, your foot and ankle are the foundation of your performance. A sudden ankle or foot injury can leave you unable to give your best on the field or in the gym. That's why we provide a range of ankle and foot braces, wraps, and sleeves to help you recover quickly and get back to performing at the top of your game.


Our braces, wraps, and sleeves offer ample support, stabilizing weak joints, muscles, and ligaments. This helps prevent future injuries and minimizes damage experienced due to a current injury. It also speeds up the healing process, getting you back on the field or court faster.


Our products come in three different protection levels, catering to every foot and ankle injury from sprains and strains to tendonitis and major joint instabilities. Adjustable straps allow you to customize the tightness, compression level, and fit of our foot and ankle braces, sleeves, and wraps to meet your needs. Browse our collection of products, and we are confident you will find exactly what you need to rehabilitate or prevent a foot or ankle injury.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Foot and Ankle Injury Support | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Protect and recover quickly from foot and ankle injuries with McDavid's range of braces, wraps, and sleeves. Our products offer ample support to weak joints, muscles, and ligaments, preventing future injuries and minimizing damage caused by a current injury. Shop now and get back to performing at the top of your game.

Title: Ankle Braces & Supports For Common Ankle Injuries
Braces for Ankle Sprains
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Ankle Sprain Recovery - Braces, Wraps & Supports | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Ankle sprains can be painful and limit mobility, but with the right treatment and support, it's possible to recover quickly and prevent future injuries. Choose from McDavid's range of ankle braces and supports to reduce pain and swelling, improve stability and mobility, and promote healing.

These products can help reduce pain and inflammation, provide support and stability, and promote healing.

Title: Braces For Achilles Tendonitis
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Achilles Tendonitis Protection & Support | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Achilles tendonitis can cause discomfort and affect your mobility, but with the right treatment and support, it's possible to recover and prevent future injuries. Choose from McDavid's range of ankle braces, compression sleeves, and supports to reduce pain and inflammation, provide support and stability, and promote healing.

Title: Osteoarthritis Knee Braces & Sleeves
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Knee Osteoarthritis Braces & Support | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Living with osteoarthritis of the knee can be challenging, but McDavid's range of knee braces and supports can help reduce pain and inflammation, improve mobility, and prevent further damage. Consult with a healthcare professional to determine the best course of treatment and explore McDavid's products to support your knee and improve your quality of life.

Title: Sleeves And Supports For Leg Injuries
Body HTML:
Sleeves and Supports for Leg Injuries and Pain


When it comes to leg injuries, prevention and protection are key. That's why McDavid offers a range of braces and supports designed to deliver minor to maximum protection and support for the legs. From knee to ankle and calf/shin to thigh/groin, our products are engineered to offer targeted compression and thermal therapy to help reduce inflammation and promote healing. Whether you're recovering from an injury or looking to prevent one, our leg braces and supports can help you get back in the game with confidence.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Leg Injury Braces & Supports | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Protect your legs from injuries with McDavid's range of leg braces and supports. Designed to deliver targeted compression and thermal therapy, our products provide minor to maximum protection for the knee, ankle, calf/shin, and thigh/groin. Whether you're recovering from an injury or looking to prevent one, McDavid can help you get back in the game with confidence.

Title: Wrist Support Wraps & Braces
Body HTML:
Braces for Wrist & Thumb Pain Injuries


At McDavid, we understand how debilitating a wrist injury can be for an athlete. That's why we offer a range of wrist supports, wraps, and braces that not only provide support and stabilization but also comfort and relief. Our products are designed to alleviate pain and discomfort from common wrist injuries such as sprains, carpal tunnel syndrome, and ganglion cysts.


Our wrist supports and braces come with features like targeted compression, ice therapy, and stabilization of the thumb to relieve the pain of arthritis. We use high-quality materials such as gel buttresses for comfort, latex-free neoprene, and breathable elastic to ensure maximum comfort and support.


Our wrist braces, supports, and wraps are highly customizable, ensuring a perfect fit for your wrist injury. Trust McDavid to provide the best support for your wrist injury, so you can get back to training and competing at your best.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Wrist Injury Support - Braces, Wraps & Compression | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: McDavid offers a range of wrist supports, braces, and wraps for common wrist injuries. Our highly customizable products alleviate pain and discomfort with targeted compression, ice therapy, and stabilization features. Get back to training and competing at your best with McDavid.

Consult with a healthcare professional and use McDavid products to support your thumb and alleviate your symptoms.

Title: Braces for Elbow Injury Relief and Support
Body HTML:
Elbow Supports for Elbow Pain & Injuries


Elbow injuries can be painful and disruptive to your daily life. McDavid offers a range of products designed to provide support and relief for people with elbow injuries, including elbow braces, supports, and compression sleeves. These products can help reduce pain and inflammation, improve mobility and function, and promote healing. If you're experiencing the symptoms of an elbow injury, consult with a healthcare professional to determine the best course of treatment, and consider using McDavid products to support your elbow and aid in your recovery.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Elbow Injury Relief & Prevention | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Elbow injuries can be painful and disrupt daily life. Choose from McDavid's range of elbow braces, supports, and compression sleeves to reduce pain and inflammation, improve mobility and function, and promote healing. Consult with a healthcare professional to determine the best course of treatment for your elbow injury.

Title: Braces and Supports for Elbow Pain Injuries
Braces & Sleeves for Elbow Hyperextension Injuries
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Elbow Hyperextension Support & Braces | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Elbow hyperextension can be painful, but with the right support and care, it's possible to recover and prevent future injuries. Choose from McDavid's range of elbow braces and supports to reduce pain and swelling, improve stability and mobility, and promote healing.

Title: Braces & Sleeves for Elbow Hyperextension Injuries
Elbow Arthritis Braces Supports, and Sleeves
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Elbow Arthritis Relief & Protection Products | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Elbow arthritis can cause discomfort and affect your mobility, but with the right support and care, it's possible to manage the symptoms and improve your quality of life. Choose from McDavid's range of elbow braces, supports, and compression sleeves to reduce pain and inflammation, improve mobility and function, and promote healing.

Title: Back & Waist Injury Support & Braces
Body HTML:
Back Braces For Common Back Injuries and Waist Trimmers for Core Support


Protecting your spine is crucial to prevent aches, strains, and pains. McDavid's back supports and waist trimmers provide support, compression, and pain relief. Our products offer three levels of protection based on your needs, helping you to achieve your goals with minimal discomfort. Protecting your core is crucial, whether you're playing contact or non-contact sports. Our gear can help you stay in the game and avoid unnecessary injuries. Give your spine the protection it deserves and keep performing at your best with McDavid.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Back & Waist Injury Support & Braces | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Protect your spine and stay active with McDavid's back supports and waist trimmers. Our products provide the necessary support, compression, and pain relief to help you achieve your goals and avoid unnecessary injuries. Whether you're playing contact or non-contact sports, trust McDavid to keep your core strong and protect your spine.

Title: Back Braces for Lower Back Pain Injury
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Lower Back Pain Relief & Support Gear | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Lower back pain can be debilitating, but with the right support and care, it's possible to manage the symptoms and improve your mobility. Choose from McDavid's range of back braces and compression shorts to reduce pain and inflammation and promote healing. Consult with a healthcare professional to determine the best course of treatment for your lower back pain.

Metafield: title_tag [string]: Herniated Disk Support & Relief Gear | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: A herniated disc can be a painful and debilitating condition, but with the right support and care, it's possible to recover and improve your mobility. Choose from McDavid's range of back braces, compression shorts, and lumbar supports to reduce pain and inflammation and promote healing. Consult with a healthcare professional to determine the best course of treatment for your herniated disc.

Title: Back Braces for Herniated Disk Support and Relief
Back & Waist Braces for Abdominal Strains Support & Protection
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Abdominal Strains Support & Protection Gear | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Abdominal strains can cause discomfort and affect your daily activities, but with the right support and care, it's possible to manage the symptoms and improve your mobility. Choose from McDavid's range of compression shorts and supports to reduce pain and inflammation and promote healing. Consult with a healthcare professional to determine the best course of treatment for your abdominal strain.

Title: Back & Waist Braces for Abdominal Strains Support & Protection
Braces For Common Shoulder Injuries
Body HTML:
Braces For Shoulder Injuries


Don't let shoulder injuries slow you down. Our shoulder wraps and supports offer a range of protection levels to help relieve pain and promote healing. Designed to provide rest, compression, thermal activity, and limited mobility, our wraps and supports are perfect for those suffering from sprains, strains, or tendonitis. With adjustable straps for a custom fit, our simple yet effective design can help to relieve pain and give your joints the rest they need. Don't let injuries compromise your range of motion, protect your shoulder and continue to compete at your best with McDavid.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Shoulder Injury Braces & Supports | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Protect your shoulder and maintain your active lifestyle with McDavid's shoulder wraps and supports. Our products provide rest, compression, and limited mobility to relieve pain and promote healing from sprains, strains, or tendonitis. Our adjustable straps ensure a custom fit for your unique needs.

Title: Rotator Cuff Tear Injury Support & Recovery
Braces For Shoulder Dislocation
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Shoulder Dislocation Braces & Supports | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Recover from shoulder dislocation with McDavid's comfortable and adjustable shoulder braces and supports. Title: Braces for Shoulder/AC Joint Separation
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Shoulder/AC Joint Separation Braces & Supports | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Recover from Shoulder/AC Joint Separation with McDavid's shoulder braces and supports. Our products stabilize and protect the AC joint while providing the comfort and mobility you need. With a range of designs and sizes, you can find the perfect fit for your unique needs and get back to your active lifestyle. Trust McDavid to help you recover from your shoulder injury.

Title: Compression Arm Sleeves
Body HTML:
Compression Arm Sleeves


Our Compression Arm Sleeves are designed to help you perform at your best. Our hDc® moisture management technology offers durable fabric that will stand up to the competition while still keeping your skin cool and refreshed. The sleeves are designed to improve circulation and reduce muscle fatigue, providing extra support for your arm muscles during workouts, training or competition. With our HEX® technology, our arm sleeves offer 9mm HEX® padding to protect muscles while preventing scratches, abrasions and bruising. Our arm sleeves come in a range of sizes and colors, so you can find the perfect fit for your needs.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Compression Arm Sleeves - Ultimate Arm Support & Performance | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Our Compression Arm Sleeves feature hDc® moisture management technology to keep you cool and refreshed, while the HEX® technology provides 9mm padding to protect muscles. Find your perfect fit today.

Title: Compression Shorts and Tights
Body HTML:
Compression Shorts & Tights


Take your training to the next level with McDavid's Compression Bottoms. Our compression gear is designed to keep you cool and comfortable while providing the support and stability you need for optimal performance. Whether you prefer tights, shorts, or pants, our compression bottoms offer the right amount of compression to help reduce muscle soreness and fatigue. The moisture-wicking fabric ensures that you stay dry and comfortable during even the most intense workouts. Don't let muscle fatigue slow you down. Experience the benefits of McDavid's Compression Bottoms and train with confidence.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Compression Bottoms - Ultimate Support & Performance | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Get the support and stability you need with McDavid's Compression Bottoms. Our compression gear helps reduce muscle soreness and fatigue, so you can train with confidence.

Title: Compression Leg Sleeves
Body HTML:
Compression Leg Sleeves


Protect your legs and improve your performance with McDavid's compression leg sleeves. Designed to reduce inflammation, strains, and sprains, our leg sleeves feature hDc™ moisture management technology, which provides a comfortable, breathable, and flexible compression fabric that enhances circulation and recovery. Whether you're training or competing, our Targeted Compression® technology helps to stabilize muscles, provide pain relief, and prevent injuries. Our leg sleeves are lightweight, ergonomic, and available in various colors and sizes to fit your needs. Don't let leg pain slow you down; choose McDavid's compression leg sleeves and keep pushing forward.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Compression Leg Sleeves - Superior Performance & Recovery | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Reduce inflammation, strains, and sprains with McDavid's compression leg sleeves. Our Targeted Compression® technology stabilizes muscles, providing pain relief and injury prevention.

Title: Compression Performance Socks
Body HTML:
Compression Socks


Experience the ultimate in foot and leg support with McDavid compression socks. Our socks offer advanced compression technology to improve circulation and reduce muscle fatigue, making them an ideal choice for athletes, travelers, and those on their feet all day. With a variety of colors and styles to choose from, McDavid compression socks are both stylish and functional. Whether you’re looking for ankle, crew, or knee-high socks, we have the perfect pair for you. Invest in the comfort and support your feet deserve with McDavid compression socks.

Title: Compression Shirts & Tanks
Body HTML:
Compression Shirts and Tanks


Experience optimal performance during workouts with McDavid compression shirts and tanks. Our compression technology promotes better blood flow, increases oxygen delivery to your muscles, and reduces muscle vibration, reducing fatigue and recovery time. Stay comfortable during workouts with our moisture-wicking technology that helps keep you dry and cool. We offer a variety of designs to suit every preference, including long-sleeve shirts, short-sleeve shirts, and tanks, all made with the highest quality materials. Give yourself the best chance to perform at your best by choosing McDavid's compression shirts and tanks.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Compression Tops - Maximum Performance & Comfort | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Perform at your best with McDavid's compression shirts and tanks. Our moisture-wicking technology keeps you dry and cool, while targeted compression promotes better blood flow and reduces muscle vibration.

Title: Thigh/Groin Sleeves & Wraps
Body HTML:
Thigh/Groin Wraps and Sleeves


For athletes, strong legs are key to success in any sport. But with constant wear and tear, your thighs and groin can suffer from fatigue and inflammation. That's why we created compression and padded shorts to provide the support you need. Our thigh wraps offer targeted compression to promote recovery and reduce pain. With our compression shorts, you get all-around protection, so you can focus on achieving your goals without worrying about injury.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Thigh & Groin Support - Best Sports Protection | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Get the best thigh and groin support items at McDavidUSA. Our products are designed to provide you with maximum protection and recovery. Browse our selection of thigh sleeves, compression shorts, and more. Order now and take your performance to the next level!

Title: HEX® Padded Protective Shorts, Tights, and Girdles
Body HTML: Our state-of-the-art protective gear helps to improve your performance as it supports your body, muscles and movement.
Metafield: title_tag [string]: HEX® Padded Protective Bottoms | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Looking for high-performance sports protection and support? Check out McDavid's HEX® Padded Protective Bottoms, including shorts, tights, and girdles. Designed to promote healing and offer excellent comfort, these products are perfect for anyone looking to improve their game.

Title: Braces & Supports
Body HTML:
Sports Medicine Braces & Supports - Recovery Gear


McDavid SportMed® provides unparalleled support and protection for athletes with Knee, Ankle, Elbow, Shoulder, and Back Injuries. Our collection of Braces & Supports is designed to provide both preemptive and rehabilitative protection, ensuring the best possible performance.


Our products are recommended by physicians and athletic trainers to speed up recovery times and prevent injuries from happening. With varying levels of support and adjustability, McDavid products offer a targeted level of protection, performance, and comfort to help you get back in the game.


Shop By Body Part: Knee Braces and Supports | Ankle Braces and Supports | Elbow Supports and Bands | Back/Waist Supports | Shoulder Braces and Supports | Wrist Guards and Supports | Thigh Sleeves and Wraps
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Braces & Supports - Sports Recovery Gear | McDavidUSA
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Find the best SportMed® braces and protection gear at McDavidUSA. Shop our wide selection of sports recovery items, sleeves, wraps, and more, and get free shipping on eligible orders. Keep your body protected and enhance your performance with McDavidUSA.

Title: Pickleball Performance Gear & Essentials
Body HTML:
Pickleball Essentials: Gear & Equipment for Peak Performance


Pickleball is an exhilarating blend of strategy, agility, and precision, demanding both mental acuity and physical finesse. At McDavid, we recognize the unique challenges players face on the Pickleball court, from quick lateral movements to powerful overhead shots. We understand the importance of gear that not only enhances performance but also safeguards against common injuries that can disrupt your game.

Our Pickleball gear collection is meticulously crafted to provide the support and protection you need to excel on the court. 

Don't let anything hold you back from enjoying the thrill of Pickleball. Explore our selection of high-performance gear today and experience the difference McDavid can make in your game!
